questions.question: What is the primary function of an operating system?
choices: To manage hardware resources and provide services to software
questions.answer: To manage hardware resources and provide services to software

questions.question: Which programming language is commonly used for front-end web development?
What is the purpose of CSS in web development?
choices: To define the structure of a web page
To add interactivity to a web page
To style the presentation of a web page
questions.answer: To style the presentation of a web page

questions.question: What is a responsive web design?
choices: A design that responds to user input
A design that adapts to different screen sizes and devices
questions.answer: A design that adapts to different screen sizes and devices

questions.question: What is the purpose of a web server?
choices: To host and serve web pages to clients
questions.answer: To host and serve web pages to clients

questions.question: What does SEO stand for in the context of web development?
Which database management system is commonly used for web applications?
What is the purpose of the HTTP protocol in web development?
choices: To format text on a web page
To transfer data between a client and a server
questions.answer: To transfer data between a client and a server
